BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HOSPICE FOUNDATION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION PROMOTES THE VALUES OF HOSPICE CARE. IT IS DEDICATED TO PROVIDING SUPPORT SOLELY FOR THE PROGRAMS AND OPERATIONS OF THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK D/B/A HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK. THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION WORKS TO ENHANCE HOSPICE PROGRAMS AND INITIATIVES. THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION IS CHARGED WITH RECEIVING, SOLICITING, PRUDENTLY MANAGING AND INVESTING ALL FORMS OF CHARITABLE GIFTS FROM INDIVIDUALS, ORGANIZATIONS AND FOUNDATIONS. IT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR DISTRIBUTING RESTRICTED AND UNRESTRICTED GRANTS TO THE HOSPICE OF CNY IN ACCORDANCE WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS AND EXISTING POLICIES OF THE FOUNDATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION PROMOTES THE VALUES OF HOSPICE CARE. IT IS DEDICATED TO PROVIDING SUPPORT SOLELY FOR THE PROGRAMS AND OPERATIONS OF THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK D/B/A HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK. THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION WORKS TO ENHANCE HOSPICE PROGRAMS AND INITIATIVES.
IRS990.Desc: SOLICITING, RECEIVING, AND ACKNOWLEDGING ALL FORMS OF CHARITABLE GIFTS FROM INDIVIDUALS, ORGANIZATIONS AND FOUNDATIONS VIA FUNDRAISING EVENTS AND MAIL SOLICITATIONS. 5,467 GIFTS RECEIVED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GRANTS AND ALLOCATIONS MADE TO THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK DBA HOSPICE OF CNY INCLUDING ONE OPERATIONS GRANT AND MONTHLY GRANTS TO DISTRIBUTE RESTRICTED FUNDS BASED UPON EXPENDITURES MADE IN ACCORDANCE WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: DUE TO THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE USED TO PROVIDE FUTURE FUNDING TO SUPPORT THE MISSION OF THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK D/B/A HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK.

THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES AS AN ORGANIZATION QUALIFIED UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE CODE). THE FOUNDATION HAS ALSO BEEN CLASSIFIED BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE AS AN ENTITY THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A) OF THE CODE.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK
THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: DISTRIBUTE TEMP RESTRICTED FUNDS FOR PROGRAM EXPENSES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION ONLY SUPPORTS THE PROGRAMS AND OPERATIONS OF THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK. EACH YEAR THE GRANT IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. RESTRICTED GRANTS ARE DISTRIBUTED TO THE CARING COALITION UPON VALIDATION OF EXPENDITURES MADE IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE RESTRICTION STIPULATED BY THE DONORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT OF THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK, INC., ROSANNE DIDIO, IS MARRIED TO CHRISTOPHER DIDIO, THE FIRST VICE PRESIDENT ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK DBA HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK (D/B/A HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK) IS THE SOLE CORPORATE MEMBER OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE IS ONE MEMBER, THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK (D/B/A HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK). HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK HAS THE RIGHTS AND POWERS TO ELECT THE FOUNDATION'S DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK HAS THE EXCLUSIVE POWER AND AUTHORITY TO AMEND, REPEAL, OR ADOPT BY-LAWS OF THE FOUNDATION. IN ADDITION THE HOSPICE OF CENTRAL NEW YORK HAS ALL RIGHTS AND POWERS RELATED TO ELECTION OF FOUNDATION DIRECTORS, AMENDING THE CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION OF THE FOUNDATION, APPROVE ANY MERGER OR CONSOLIDATION OF THE FOUNDATION, APPROVE THE DISSOLUTION OF THE FOUNDATION, AND APPROVE THE SALE OR ENCUMBRANCE OF ALL OR SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF THE ASSETS OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS SENT TO ALL EXECUTIVE/FINANCE COMMITTEE MEMBERS VIA E-MAIL FOR THEIR APPROVAL. UPON APPROVAL, THEIR RECOMMENDATION FOR ACCEPTANCE IS FORWARDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ALONG WITH AN ELECTRONIC VERSION OF THE FORM 990. AFTER THE BOARD ACCEPTS THE EXECUTIVE/FINANCE COMMITTEE'S RECOMMENDATION, THE FORM 990 WILL BE SIGNED AND FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH YEAR FOLLOWING THE ANNUAL MEETING, ALL BOARD MEMBERS ARE CONTACTED AND ASKED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM. FOLLOW-UP E-MAILS AND PHONE CALLS ARE MADE UNTIL ALL OF THE FORMS ARE RETURNED. THE FOUNDATION DOES NOT HAVE ANY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A HIGH LEVEL FINANCIAL PICTURE IS PROVIDED IN THE HOSPICE'S ANNUAL REPORT, WHICH IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON THE FOUNDATION'S WEBSITE. IRS FORMS 990 AND 1023, CORPORATION'S BY-LAWS, CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION, LATEST AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN OR IN PERSON REQUEST AT OUR OFFICE WITHOUT CHARGE OTHER THAN A REASONABLE CHARGE FOR COPYING AND POSTAGE.

THE EXECUTIVE/FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT. THE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE RESULTS OF THE AUDIT WITH THE INDEPENDENT AUDITORS AND HAS RESPONSIBILITY FOR RECOMMENDING FINAL APPROVAL OF THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE COMMITTEE ALSO APPOINTS THE INDEPENDENT AUDITORS.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: PROVIDE END OF LIFE CARE TO PATIENTS

OtherOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK
THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK
THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE R, PART V, LINE 1D
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CARING COALITION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK HAS A REVOLVING LINE OF CREDIT WITH A FINANCIAL INSTITUTION. THERE WERE NO BORROWINGS AGAINST THIS LINE DURING THE FISCAL YEAR. THE HOSPICE FOUNDATION OF CENTRAL NEW YORK, INC. IS THE GUARANTOR FOR THIS LINE OF CREDIT.
